name: Mrs Nova
text: Oh, hello, boys.. Did you come to help me?

option_dialogues.name: Omyx
option_dialogues.text: Hmm yeah I guess.. What do you need help with?

option_dialogues.name: Yamex
option_dialogues.text: Wait a minute! Since when do we have time? Weren't we here to look for combat equipment for you?

option_dialogues.name: Omyx
option_dialogues.text: Yes, but um... helping others is more important

option_dialogues.name: Yamex
option_dialogues.text: Okay, okay then, but what do you want help with?

option_dialogues.name: Mrs Nova
option_dialogues.text: I just need to deliver a bag of coal to the person who lives on top of the mountain. Don't worry, it's a safe and fast way.

option_dialogues.name: Mrs Nova
option_dialogues.text: But first, I want you to bring a bag of coal from the blacksmith northwest of the village.

option_dialogues.name: Omyx
option_dialogues.text: Okay then let's get going quickly

option_dialogues.name: Yamex
option_dialogues.text: I'm so sorry but we're in a hurry
